shows.Title: Mr. Robot
shows.Plot: Elliot, a brilliant but highly unstable young cyber-security engineer and vigilante hacker, becomes a key figure in a complex game of global dominance when he and his shadowy allies try to take down the corrupt corporation he work...

shows.Title: Interstellar
shows.Plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

shows.Title: Iron Man
shows.Plot: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

shows.Title: Black Mirror
shows.Plot: An anthology series exploring a twisted, high-tech multiverse where humanity's greatest innovations and darkest instincts collide.

shows.Title: Breaking Bad
shows.Plot: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's future.

shows.Title: Spider-Man
shows.Plot: After being bitten by a genetically-modified spider, a shy teenager gains spider-like abilities that he uses to fight injustice as a masked superhero and face a vengeful enemy.

shows.Title: Money Heist
shows.Plot: An unusual group of robbers attempt to carry out the most perfect robbery in Spanish history - stealing 2.4 billion euros from the Royal Mint of Spain.
